review: Works very well and you can carry anywhere
author: Eric F.

review: It's works fine but sometimes it gets a chopping.
author: Daniel Alamo

review: Easy to set up. Easy to stream Netflix. That's all we wanted it for. Eliminates the need for an HDMI cord reaching across the room to my device.
author: AmpGuitarChase

review: The reason I bought this over its competitors was support for casting a tab in chrome. However I haven't been able to find a site that works (tried NFL network, DirectTV, CNN). Also there was no sound when using the Hulu app, which is supposed to be supported.
author: Remmy412

review: It works great.  However, I sometimes notice that the video will cut in and out.  This could be because the wireless router is on the other side of the house.
author: Josue Vivas
